name: Furior - Inside Skull Mountain
description:
Furior is furious.

He lost himself.

In the last battle with Dramaking, Furior helpless was defeated.

The overkill of the Dramaking’s huge Egor ended up by engulfing the cosmos in a violent whirlwind of plaintive and self-centered emotions. Plunging the universe into a chaos of victimization competition.

Furior is alone. Stuck inside the immeasurable Egor of Dramaking.

After several times of wandering, Furior is about to recover his lost ego, hidden inside the sinister Skull Mountain where it belches the magma of hate.

Once reunited with his ego, he will be powerfull enough to go for his new quest: Recover the Hoover-Blade:

His trusty sword with which he can escape from this cursed place and return home.
